CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 20, 1965, pg. 7 reads: "Celebrate Anniversary - Relatives and friends who helped Mr. and Mrs. Lorenzo Adams celebrate their 50th wedding anniversary. The affair was held at the Christian Tabernacle, on Saturday, March 13.  Left to right, seated: Mrs. Alice Adams, Mrs. Ida Mae Jackson, Mrs. Louis Adams, Mrs. Sadie Harris, Mr. and Mrs. Lorenzo R. Adams, Mrs. Helen Ballou, Mrs. Jeanne Daniels, Mrs. Margaret Adams and Mrs. Geneva Adams.  Standing: Ralph B. Adams, Joseph J. Jackson, First Sgt. William L. Adams, Cornelius C. Harris, Henry W. Adams, Miss Mabel Adams, Joseph Daniels, Alderman John H. Adams and Thomas E. Adams. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr. and Mrs. Lorenzo Adams seated on end table, in domestic interior with wood paneled walls and plaque on wall inscribed "Mother"
